https://tmrev.io/movie/481786-Cho Ninja Tai Inazuma 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Jun Terada is a producer in the year 2076 and is trying to convince the president of Magical TV to allow her to create her life's work, Ch≈ç Ninja Tai Inazuma!, based on the long-standing legend of a legendary lightning that bestows powers upon those struck by it. However, because the show is to be the 100th anniversary of the Hyper Hero Team Series" , it must be a first for the 100-year-long franchise. President Mishima convinces her to turn it into a reality show by traveling back to 1720 in the Edo period and picking three extremely inept locals and force them through humiliating training to become ninja. Cho Ninja Tai Inazuma
